Dear Gus, 

     Congratulations! As always you show a very good taste. Your 
statuettes are beautiful!
     Two small problems : Your URL didn't come complete (the HTML was 
lacking and I had to copy and paste it again) and, by the way, what 
is a "SAMURAI" with a NAGATINA??? ;) ;) ;) ;)
     Your friend
     KALLIKRATES (Ubaldo)
